ovdesc.p: This table is used to store the non-working days for channels based on region of a country code.

desc.p: Record Activation Code generated for the record by the payment's hub.
Indicates a Region,State etc. within a Country.
1) Non Mandatory field - Defaulted to "ALL" if left blank.
2) "ALL" if this applies for all Region within the mentioned Countrycode.
The above "ALL" setup is used to define a country level holiday.
3) Up to 35 Alphanumeric characters, which should represent Valid Region values as defined in the PPT.REGION table.
The Region entered should belong to the CountryCode entered.
Record Status Code generated for the record by the payments hub.
Indicates a valid channel code for which holiday is being defined.
SWIFT – Society for Worldwide Interbank Financial Transactions.This channel is used for international payments worldwide.
PMTROUTER – Payment Router. This channel is used only by ABN AMRO.
CEC – Centre for Exchange and Clearing
HKICL – Hong Kong Interbank Clearing Limited
The value links to the field ‘ChannelName’ in PPT.CHANNEL.
Indicates the company ID for which the record is created.
The value links to the field ‘CompanyID’ in PPT.COMPANY
Specifies country code for which holiday is defined.
Mandatory field. 2 alphanumeric characters.Value links to field, 'COUNTRY.CODE' in COUNTRY.
Represents the actual holiday date for the respective country and region.
Mandatory field. Any valid date can be selected by clicking on the Calendar.
Allows up to 11 characters in Date format.
